ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am going to add my congratulations anyway haha. I find that 50 is different.  Better in some ways, not so good in others.  More relaxing, and also more
ygData.messageBody:
> > > From: <kim@...>
> > >
> > > Doh. I hit 50 this weekend.
> >
> > Congrats!!
>
> Thanks, everyone who is congratulating me. Dunno why, it's
> just another number to me. :)


I am going to add my congratulations anyway haha.

I find that 50 is different. Better in some ways, not so good in others. More
relaxing, and also more pressure to get into bigger events.

Lots of server politics and so forth due to the overcrowding can make that
frustrating. SOunds like you have an active guild though, which is nice =).

The day I made 50, I had a perfectly miserable night the night before; I died twice
and had horribly long corpe recovery in lower Guk and live side. What I thought was
an easy 1/4 bubble to get became 1/2 bubble by the end of the night.

The next morning my in-game husband was on and we went to the safe hall on the dead
side (near the jail) and just stayed there for an hour or so. After I leveled, he
had to go for awhile, and I went and collected the rest of the pieces I needed for
my black and gold outfit. I put my lambent away that day =). And then I just sort
of wandered around for awhile haha. Hmmm come to think of it, someone still owes me
a party with lots of booze.


Maravana Vireo, who is terribly chatty today
50th Bard of Jus Divinum
www.jusdivinum.com
Mithaniel Marr
